books.title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
books.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A captivating novel about a reclusive Hollywood icon who finally decides to tell her story to an unknown journalist.
books.featured_review: An absolutely mesmerizing tale that kept me turning pages until 3 AM. Reid's storytelling is phenomenal!

books.title: Educated
books.author: Tara Westover
books.description: A powerful memoir about education, transformation, and the struggle between loyalty and independence.
books.featured_review: This memoir is both heartbreaking and inspiring. Westover's journey from isolation to education is remarkable.

books.title: The Midnight Library
books.author: Matt Haig
books.description: A thought-provoking novel about life's infinite possibilities and the choices we make.
books.featured_review: A beautiful exploration of what could have been. Made me reflect on my own life choices deeply.

books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.description: A practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones through small changes that deliver remarkable results.
books.featured_review: Changed my entire approach to productivity. The 1% better every day concept is life-changing!

books.title: Klara and the Sun
books.author: Kazuo Ishiguro
books.description: A touching story told from the perspective of an artificial friend observing human nature and love.
books.featured_review: Ishiguro's prose is beautiful as always. Klara's perspective on humanity is both unique and moving.

books.title: Project Hail Mary
books.author: Andy Weir
books.description: A thrilling space adventure about humanity's last hope for survival, filled with science, humor, and heart.
books.featured_review: The best sci-fi I've read in years! Weir perfectly balances science, humor, and heart.

books.title: The Song of Achilles
books.author: Madeline Miller
books.description: A stunning retelling of the Iliad that brings the ancient world to vivid life through the eyes of Patroclus.
books.featured_review: Miller's prose is lyrical and beautiful. This love story will break your heart in the best way.

books.title: Circe
books.author: Madeline Miller
books.description: A captivating novel about the Greek goddess Circe, her powers, and her transformation from outcast to formidable witch.
books.featured_review: A powerful story of female agency and transformation. Miller gives voice to a forgotten goddess brilliantly.
